short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Predict your fuel cost before you hit the road with this extension for Google Maps™.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fuel Cost calculates the cost of gas per trip based on your vehicle and local gas price. Select your vehicle in the settings page and let Fuel Cost do the rest!

(Currently in Open Beta. Only available for US & Canada.)

Have a problem or suggestion for the app? Send feedback to fuelcostextension@gmail.com



Google Maps is a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
Icons made by Google and Freepik from www.flaticon.com

-Privacy Policy-
Route information like start address and end address is sent to our server to heuristically approximate fuel usage. At no point is this information collected or stored in a database of any kind.
